claims.claim: Prison environments have changed significantly over the past two decades.
claims.quote: In prison in 1991. And so what is that, 20 years ago or something? It definitely was a different environment of where it is now.

claims.claim: Recidivism is a common challenge faced by formerly incarcerated individuals.
claims.quote: when I got out, I went right back after three months for selling drugs.

claims.claim: Community support plays a crucial role in the successful reintegration of formerly incarcerated individuals.
claims.quote: the community I think as a whole really embraced me and just how I grew up.

claims.claim: The awareness and magnification of the pipeline to prison have increased over time.
claims.quote: I was in a period that the whole pipeline to prison wasn't so magnified as it is today.

claims.claim: Former adversaries can become collaborators in community efforts.
claims.quote: the guy who arrested me on my drug case wound up becoming the chief of police. And then I sat on a board with him.

claims.claim: Active participation in community and religious organizations aids reentry.
